Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile

Class HFilePrettyPrinter.SimpleReporter.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.HFilePrettyPrinter.SimpleReporter.Builder
Enclosing class:
HFilePrettyPrinter.SimpleReporter
public static class HFilePrettyPrinter.SimpleReporter.Builder extends Object
A builder for HFilePrettyPrinter.SimpleReporter instances. Defaults to using the default locale and time zone, writing to System.out.
